name: Disable Block Editor FullScreen mode
author: Ankit Panchal

sections.description:
This plugin is useful to Disable Block Editor default FullScreen mode in Latest WordPress 5.4+

You can check our other plugins:

  1. The Essential WordPress Toolkit – UltimaKit For WP
  2. Like Dislike For WP
  3. Hide Admin Bar Based on User Roles
sections.installation:
e.g.

  1. Upload disable-block-editor-fullscreen-mode.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You’re done!
sections.faq:
Is this plugin works on older WP versions?

Nop, Minimum 5.4 WP Version required.
